subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan before the establishment of the British Raj
question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan during the period before the establishment of the British Raj?
question_hi: राजस्थान के बिल्डिगंड से पहले ब्रिटिष Raj की स्थापना से पहले राजधानी की जानकारी के लिए
explanation_en: Amber was the capital of Rajasthan during the period before the establishment of the British Raj.
explanation_hi: अमेर राजस्थान के बीएन से पहले राजधानी की जानकारी
अमेर राजस्थान के बीएन से पहले राजधानी की जानकारी

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rana of Mewar?
question_hi: मैवर के पहले राजन कौंचा था?
explanation_en: Uday Singh was the first Rana of Mewar.
explanation_hi: उदासिंग मैवर के पहले रानी था।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was the capital of Rajasthan during the Mughal era?
question_hi: मुगल वर्षिया के विभागी किस्मान में किस्मान किस्मान का शास्त्रा को आगे।
explanation_en: Jaipur was the capital of Rajasthan during the Mughal era.
explanation_hi: जापुर मुगल वर्षिया के एगों में का शास्त्रा को आगे।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which ruler was the founder of the Mewar kingdom?
question_hi: मीवर कंक्षां के शास्त्रा को आगे।
explanation_en: Rājpura (Rājpura) was the founder of the Mewar kingdom.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput clan was influential during the Mughal rule?
explanation_en: The Jat clan was influential during the Mughal rule in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king was the first to rule Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rana Rana Kushwana was the first Rajput king to rule Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is known for its rich cultural heritage?
explanation_en: Amber is famous for its rich cultural heritage.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the ruler of Rajasthan during the reign of Emperor Akbar?
explanation_en: Amer, also known as Amber, was the ruler of Rajasthan during the reign of Emperor Akbar.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who ruled Rajasthan during the rule of Rana Meena?
explanation_en: Rana Meena, also known as Amber, ruled Rajasthan during the rule of Rana Meena.
